name: BattMoControlParameters
description: A description of the parameters needed by BattMo to instantiate a Li-ion battery cell model.

properties.name: control_policy
properties.description: name for the type of control protocol used

properties.name: CRate
properties.description: nominal current rate for the galvanostatic portion of the control

properties.name: lower_cutoff_voltage
properties.description: sets the enforced lower cutoff voltage for the cell

properties.name: upper_cutoff_voltage
properties.description: sets the enforced upper cutoff voltage for the cell
